example.context:
DappNode - Shopify Store
Receive Shopify proceeds into your multi-signature wallet.
See Example Integrate Now

DappNode uses the DePay Shopify Plugin to receive payments peer-to-peer, directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers benefit from a seamless payment experience and an on-the-fly token conversion.

Checkout with DePay

After selecting the DappNode of their choice, customers can select DePay upon checkout to pay directly with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet.

DAppNode receives the payment directly into their Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet.

See Example Integrate Now

interactions.response: DappNode provides customers with the ability to pay with their Web3 crypto-currency wallet directly into the Gnosis Safe multi-signature wallet. Customers can also benefit from an on-the-fly token conversion.
DePay is supported on Shopify, WooCommerce, Wordpress, and other web3 products.

The DEPAY Token is a cryptocurrency token created by DePay AG and used for DePay payments. It is an ERC-20 (Ethereum Request for Comments) token that is used to process payments, donations and other transactions across the DePay network.

responses: DAppNode is a platform for deploying and hosting DApps, P2P clients, and blockchain nodes. It provides a user-friendly way to set up and configure nodes with a couple of clicks. It also offers Nethermind Sedge, a one-click setup tool for PoS network/chain validators, which includes support for Gnosis chain mainnet and chiado testnet. Sedge takes care of the entire on-premise full node setup based on the chosen client, using generated docker-compose scripts based on the desired configuration.

DAppNode supports a variety of platforms, including Ethereum, Gnosis, and Polkadot. It also supports a range of consensus clients, such as Teku, Lighthouse, and Prysm. Additionally, it supports web3signer, which is used to verify user accounts through Ethereum and receive payments on various other chains.

The DEPAY token is a utility token that unlocks professional tools to manage Web3 Payments and allows token holders to govern the DePay payment protocol. It is currently priced at $0.1906 USD, with a circulating supply of 9,249,775 DEPAY and a market capitalization of $1,763,414 USD. You can buy DEPAY on PancakeSwap and Uniswap V2 and V3. DEPAY tokens are also used for Ecosystem Programs such as earning DEPAY, adding liquidity, and loading stakes and rewards.
